```{r, fig.align="center", fig.height=8, fig.width=10}
data %>% 
  mutate(interval = parse_factor(interval, levels = sort(as.numeric(interval)))) %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_jitter(aes(edges, interval), width = 0.1, height = 0.1) + 
  facet_wrap(~celltype_reduced) + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90)) +
  labs(x = "Detected edges", y = "Fraction") +
  theme_bw()
```
